Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Hotel THB Dos Playas places you in the heart of Cala Ratjada, convenient to Cala Ratjada Port and Cala Gat Beach. This hotel is within close proximity of Cala Agulla Beach and Canyamel Golf.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 90 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and bidets.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool or take in the view from a rooftop terrace. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access, an arcade/game room, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel THB Dos Playas. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Hotel THB Dos Playas. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Cala Ratjada Port - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Cala Gat Beach - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Cala Agulla Beach - 1.6 km / 1 mi
Canyamel Golf - 4.7 km / 2.9 mi
Cuevas de Art√† - 5.9 km / 3.6 mi
Torre de Canyamel - 6 km / 3.7 mi
Cala Millor Beach - 13.9 km / 8.6 mi
Punta de N'Amer Watch Tower - 15.2 km / 9.4 mi
Caves of Drach - 22 km / 13.7 mi
Cala Varques - 27 km / 16.7 mi
Alcudia Port - 31.3 km / 19.4 mi
Albufera Natural Park - 31.5 km / 19.5 mi
Cala Domingo Beach - 31.7 km / 19.7 mi
San Jaume Church - 32.8 km / 20.4 mi
Formentor Cape Lighthouse - 34.9 km / 21.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel THB Dos Playas is Palma de Mallorca (PMI) - 64.5 km / 40.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
